thread.title: DHS Secretary Hopes to Have Border Completed Within 2 Years
thread.title_full: DHS Secretary Hopes to Have Border Completed Within 2 Years

author: EdJenner
title: DHS Secretary Hopes to Have Border Completed Within 2 Years
text:
Go to Article 
President Donald Trump recently stated that border wall construction will begin “in months.” Secretary of Homeland Security John Kelly just said he hopes to have “it done within the next two years.” More… From Free Beacon: Secretary of Homeland Security John Kelly presented an ambitious schedule for building a wall on the U.S.-Mexico border during […]
